content: transform your living space with the luxurious charm of the big and little crochet basket set crafted with bernat plush big and bernat plush yarns these baskets keep you organized and your home and office looking great enjoy the timeless look of minimalist design with this crochet basket set the big and little crochet baskets showcase a simple color palette of white with mustard accents but you can of course make these in any color for use anywhere in the home or office - or anywhere the simplicity of this style allows for versatility seamlessly fitting into any home decor theme whether you prefer a modern classic or bohemian style these baskets are a perfect addition to your space
